document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Morning, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">comes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Considers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">coming </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">twice </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Dawns </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">upon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Morn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">sudden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">price </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Morning that comes but once
